DOC.brief_summary: This is a open label, single center, single oral dose, study of PRT054021, in healthy subjects.
DOC.brief_title: A Human Phase I Absolute Bioavailability Study of PRT054021 in Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult men ages of 19 and 65 years old, inclusive BMI of 1835 kg/m2 Clinically significant comorbid disease History of substance abuse
